name: Billy Blade and the Temple of Time
name_original: Billy Blade and the Temple of Time
description:
Billy Blade and the Temple of Time is an arcade game developed by Iridon Interactive and NERLASKA Games Development Studio. It came out on 08-04-2005. Fusion Labs published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Billy Blade and the Temple of Time on PC.
